thread.title: Cops: Man kidnapped, robbed and carjacked at gunpoint in N. Fulton
thread.title_full: Cops: Man kidnapped, robbed and carjacked at gunpoint in N. Fulton

author: Becca J. G. Godwin
title: Cops: Man kidnapped, robbed and carjacked at gunpoint in N. Fulton
text:
A man was forced to take a ride in his own car before being robbed in broad daylight, Sandy Springs police say.
A suspect with a silver handgun allegedly approached the victim in his driveway on Spalding Creek Court, ordered him into the passenger seat of the victimâ€™s car and drove him to a nearby ATM.
After the victim withdrew cash, the suspect, who was described as being in his late 20s, fled in the vehicle.
MORE: Cops: Boston model robbed after befriending N. Fulton stranger
MORE: N. Fulton mom robbed in mall parking lot with baby in car
The vehicle was later found in Lithonia and a female passenger was detained for questioning, according to a press release.
The investigation is ongoing and photos were not available. Anyone with information is asked to call Det. Kasey Smith at 770-551-3313.
